body_html:
This would be good to fix, meanwhile I've been using this work-around with FDRedirector from here

STDERR = 2
redirect = FDRedirector(STDERR)
import tensorflow as tf
sess = tf.Session("")
node = tf.Print(tf.constant(1), [tf.constant(1)], "longstringlongstring")
def print_to_stderr():
    sess.run(node)   # this prints to stderr
redirect.start();
print_to_stderr()
captured_stderr = redirect.stop()

The downside is that this hangs inside tensorflow printf if pipe buffer is exceeded (65k)

body:
This would be good to fix, meanwhile I've been using this work-around with FDRedirector from [here](https://github.com/bitemyapp/ipython/blob/master/IPython/kernel/core/fd_redirector.py)

```
STDERR = 2
redirect = FDRedirector(STDERR)
import tensorflow as tf
sess = tf.Session("")
node = tf.Print(tf.constant(1), [tf.constant(1)], "longstringlongstring")
def print_to_stderr():
    sess.run(node)   # this prints to stderr
redirect.start();
print_to_stderr()
captured_stderr = redirect.stop()
```

The downside is that this hangs inside tensorflow printf if pipe buffer is exceeded (65k)
